body_text: Why does Naruto use his mother's last name? Why does Naruto use his mother's last name, Uzumaki?

Naruto's surname confusion Naruto's father's name is Minato Namikaze, and mother is Kushina Uzumaki.
So, why is Naruto's surname Uzumaki? Shoudn't it be Namikaze?
